Class MovingCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleCircle
      • MovingCircle

  • public class MovingCircle
extends SimpleCircle
    An extension of SimpleCircle that can be moved around according to deltaX and deltaY values. Movement will continue in a given direction until the edge of the circle reaches a wall, when it will "bounce" and move in the other direction. From the coreservlets.com tutorials on servlets, JSP, Struts, JSF, Ajax, GWT, and Java.
